song_lyrics: Dharma gher ānand bhayo, jay bolo Ghanshyāmkī;
Jay jay Ghanshyāmkī, jay bolo Ghanshyāmkī.
Jay ho Dharmalālkī, jay ho Bhaktinandkī;
Chhapaiyāme shor bhayo, jay ho Ghanshyāmkī.
Brāhmaṇko dān diyo, hāthī ghoḍā pālkhī;
Hāthī ghoḍā pālkhī, jay bolo Ghanshyāmkī.
Nand gher ānand bhayo, jay Kanaiyā lālkī;
Jay jay Gopālkī, jay Kanaiyā lālkī.
Jay ho Nandlālkī, jay Jashodānand kī;
Gokul me shor bhayo, jay Kanaiyā lālkī.
title: Dharma gher ānand bhayo jay bolo Ghanshyāmkī
